EmailTemplate.description: Email Notification that gets sent out to approvers for review
EmailTemplate.name: Acct Maint Approval Request 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Maintenance Approval - {!Case.Account} - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your approval is needed to process this Account Maintenance request. Please click the link below to view the request.
{!Case.Link}
You may approve either directly from the Salesforce.com request (support case) or from the below link.
Approve/Reject. Click for details and instructions:
_______________________________________________
